title: Second positive case of COVID-19 reported in Tiruvannamalai
description: As workers of Public Health Department have sanitised streets in the area covering 10 wards under Cheyyar municipality and several other villages under Anakavur block, Tiruvannamalai has reported a se
content: As workers of Public Health Department have sanitised streets in the area covering 10 wards under Cheyyar municipality and several other villages under Anakavur block, Tiruvannamalai has reported a second positive case of coronavirus. A 43-year-old man, who w… [+776 chars]
